DOC.brief_summary: This extension study design provide long-term safety efficacy data beyond 12 month Month 36 .
DOC.brief_title: This Two-year Follow-up Study Evaluate Long-term Safety , Tolerability Efficacy 2 Different Doses Everolimus
DOC.criteria: Patients receive study medication Month 12 oneyear study ( CRAD001A2306 ) sign new Informed Consent extend treatment observation period beyond Month 12 . Females patient must agree continue use approved method birth control throughout study 3 month follow last dose study medication . Another Informed Consent require extension amendment . This Informed Consent allow separate consent amendment study , retrospective collection biopsy and/or yearly protocol biopsy Inclusion exclusion criterion change , except patient complete core study followup become eligible participate amend extension .
